title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: get count installed packages library locations, optionally total sizes, use lib_summary() function:
code: library(libminerSA) lib_summary() #>                                                                                        Library #> 1                        /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-x86_64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/wq/cd6p77z56bd7x_n52qc8yk81kxjmtr/T/RtmpR74duw/temp_libpath6ba94474d911 #> 3                                                   /Users/aydins/Library/R/x86_64/4.3/library #>   n_packages #> 1         29 #> 2          1 #> 3        153 # specify `sizes = TRUE` to calculate the total size on disk of your packages lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                                        Library #> 1                        /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-x86_64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/wq/cd6p77z56bd7x_n52qc8yk81kxjmtr/T/RtmpR74duw/temp_libpath6ba94474d911 #> 3                                                   /Users/aydins/Library/R/x86_64/4.3/library #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1         29  73048407 #> 2          1     14574 #> 3        153 422059116

what: Provides a brief summary of the package libraries on your machine — lib_summary

text: sizes sizes libraries calculated? Logical; default FALSE.

title: Provides a brief summary of the package libraries on your machine — lib_summary
text: data.frame containing count packages user's libraries. lib_size column included sizes = TRUE.

title: Provides a brief summary of the package libraries on your machine — lib_summary
code: lib_summary() #>                           Library n_packages #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                           Library n_packages lib_size #> 1 /home/runner/work/_temp/Library         69 72738260 #> 2      /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/library         29 69575875 #> 3 /opt/R/4.3.1/lib/R/site-library          1 14838588
